name: Geometric G Derivation
description: Derive Newton's constant G from phase constant kappa and 10D bulk volume.

hypothesis.H0: Newton's G is an independent free parameter unrelated to kappa and bulk volume.
hypothesis.H1: Newton's G can be derived from kappa and bulk compactification volume with error < 1.0%.

data_requirements.description: SSoT mathematical and gravity constants, bulk dimensions.

test_method: Relative error comparison between theoretical G_ksau and SSoT G_exp.
